description:
Chico is a brown haired boy who develops a sexual relationship with http://anidb.net/ch17562 [Pico]. He is younger and less sexually experienced than Pico. He often plays outdoors naked and secretly watches his http://anidb.net/ch18208 [older sister] masturbate. In most cases, Chico is the seme, despite his age, though his relationship with Pico is somewhat reversible. He lives with his sister in a large house in a secluded forest area.
